content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery


-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--Select data from a folder
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--Select data from subfolders
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


--Get data from more than one file
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

--Use more than 1 wildcard character
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
